storyInfo:
The grand entrance of Rhodes Island's elite operator, Blaze, quickly turns the battle one-sided. Seeing that nothing else can be done, Faust pulls Mephisto from the battlefield.
And thus, another situation draws to an end.

attributes.content: You have nowhere left to run.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...Damn... you!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Where do you think you're going?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Put your hands where I can see them!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've seen through all your tricks, kid with the scales!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I told you, that's not going to work!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmph, don't worry. These attacks hurt about as much as firecrackers!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You blocked my shots in advance.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: You know where they're coming from?
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Of course I do, I've already figured you out.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Amiya, back off. I'm going to use 'that'!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Got it! I'll disrupt Mephisto's guards again, so make it quick!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Take this bit of my blood as a farewell gift, Reunion's 'Phantom Crossbowmen!'
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Seethe, and blast apart their disguise!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're using your own blood as an incendiary?
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Hah, do I look like some sort of caster to you? Only some egotistical newbie would go around committing arson like that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sorry, but this is just one of my fighting techniques. Show yourselves - you have nowhere to hide!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Faust, my camouflage is gone.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Command, retreat.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What are those...?! When did Reunion hide snipers over there?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Now?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Right now.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Multiple Reunion snipers have appeared, primarily in the 2nd floor of the east building and the 3rd floor of the south building!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Proceed with caution. They might have set up ambushes for us on the lower levels!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Was the strange phenomenon in the building also caused by them?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Clever, you used refraction to make themselves seem invisible.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: However, you can't completely conceal your tracks, or make sudden movements without compromising the effect of your Arts.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Am I correct?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...You're quite smart.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: It's all because of our great intel. Now that you know the gig's up, you should surrender.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If you want to continue fighting, I'll make you pay for the deaths of Ace and Scout. Hmph, I don't even care if you weren't involved, kid.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Faust, we still have ammunition.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Retreat. We've already lost our intel advantage. I will keep them occupied. The rest of you, move immediately.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Why aren't you shooting her? Faust!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Attack, my guards! Hurry! There are four of them, just four... and only three of them pose any threat!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Fight! Tear apart those sinners now!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: With Dr. {@nickname}'s leadership, the three of us are more than enough to defeat all of you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not to mention, those Infected who you harmed, who you robbed of their free will to the point of not even being people anymore...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even that scaled boy next to you might not side with you anymore. His thoughts are filled with sorrow and turmoil...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mephisto, you are alone on this battlefield!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can read my mind?
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: No, I just felt it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, you'd have no idea what I'm thinking.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm fine, I can barely block his shots...! However, I won't be able to keep suppressing...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: GRAAAAAAGHHH!! AAAARRRRGGHH!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: My control is slipping!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mephisto, let's go.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Their reinforcements are wiping out our forces.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: We've never even seen some of them before. There's been a change in the plan. Our moves have been read.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: ...Why haven't our forces come? We have over twenty squads and two major brigades, so why are none of them here still?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Where is Crownslayer? Or FrostNova?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: This isn't like Chernobog. We couldn't shut down the enemy's communications, so they were able to call lots of reinforcements and put up a vigorous resistance.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Mephisto...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Where are they still not here yet?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We won't know the reason unless we see it for ourselves. Let's get out of here first.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Blaze, I'm about to reach my limit. Can you finish this?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sure thing. Just me and that Ch'en lady should suffice!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Quick!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Did I give you permission to leave?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You... Guards! Kill her! Kill her!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Grrr... Grooooar!!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Tsk... Over a dozen of them started moving at once. That's going to be a pain.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: GROOAAAAAR!!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: They're coming at us, Ch'en!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Thank you, Rhodes Island operator. Now, nobody can get in my way.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Haah... it's still no good? I don't have a way to completely counteract their cloaking... Forget it, this should be good enough.)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: (Chi Xiao, this time...)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: 'Crimson overflowingâ€”'
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...Gah!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...Can it be...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Uaaagh... Argh...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Thank... you...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Did you unsheath your sword just then? Just one slash? And you managed to cut down a dozen of those things?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That sword...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, I think I should start choosing my words a lot more carefully around her.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You... What did you do...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: You can't escape either.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Gah...!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Faust... Faust! You're injured! You're... no, no... Nooo!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It's over.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... He lured me in to shoot from point blank?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Didn't you manage to block it though?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: They used the cover of the explosion to make their escape!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Woah, a chain of explosions?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Argh, the entire top level is collapsing! We're not going to be able to chase after them?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Half of that was your doing.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Can't do a thing about that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hurry, we need to go.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: No, I need to stay here, until they come...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: We've failed this step. You must leave.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: I failed? I failed? Impossible!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Wasn't everything going according to plan...? Did I not call for our reinforcements a long time ago?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Were we betrayed? Was our information leaked? Who was it? Why does the L.G.D. know about our deployment and our strategies?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Just go!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: If we weren't betrayed, then who could have done it?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Talulah would never make a mistake... So she must have planned for this...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: No, that's impossible... Why would she set us up like this?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: ...Faust, there's no way I can accept this... I refuse to believe it.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Jump! I'll hold on to you!
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Well... shoot, Madam. Looks like this building's going to need some serious renovating.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's a shame that those two kids got away though.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Those mindless followers are still coming at us like cornered animals. Dealing with all of them is still going to be a serious thorn in the side.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: At least we managed to take back the headquarters.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is our victory, even if it's a short-lived one.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: How did Rhodes Island manage to make it out of Chernobog?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Miss Blaze came to our aid in the knick of time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There was also a loud-mouthed L.G.D. officer just outside the ruined city...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It would've been easier if you had just helped us in the first place instead of watching from the sidelines.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I was expecting you to say something like 'I didn't need Rhodes Island's help anyway,' or 'I'd rather die than work with them.'
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But at least you don't seem to be that stubborn. Is there anything else you'd like to say? If not, I'd like to head back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I never knew Rhodes Island had an aircraft like that.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Heh, we have a lot of things that might surprise you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just like you, we don't want to play our entire hand.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You're not counting us as one of your cards, are you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Um, Madam Ch'en... there's an incoming transmission on a private line.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: It's for you.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Agent

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Well done, Madam Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is Madam Swire also on this channel?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Please report your progress.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I bailed Rhodes Island out, and also finished arrangements for the various brigades. Coordinating and managing everything took me three full nights.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How about you, Madam Ch'en?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I've already taken backâ€”
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: â€”with Rhodes Island's assistance, we've taken back the L.G.D. Headquarters. Their commander will spread word of their defeat through the ranks.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The Reunion forces left in Lungmen have been coralled into our ambush points using the routes we arranged for them.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Next, we just need to wait for their counterattack.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: My mission is now complete.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I've also received reports from a few of your other colleagues. All missions in the last phase have been completed flawlessly. Well done, all of you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We will now move onto the next phase.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu
